nodes.text: The Mandalorian Bralor clan owned a farm on the planet Mandalore, the cultural homeworld of the Mandalorians located in the Outer Rim region of the galaxy. Clan Bralor's farm was situated north of Mandalore's capital city, Keldabe, and a few kilometers from Kyrimorut, the home of Clan Skirata. During the final years of the Galactic Republic and the subsequent rise of the Galactic Empire in its place, the farm was home to the female Mandalorian soldier Rav Bralor and her niece, Parja Bralor. Following the end of the Clone Wars, the Bralor farm came to house the clone commando deserters of Yayax Squad, whom Rav Bralor had trained on Kamino during her time as member of the Cuy'val Dar.
Clan Bralor's farm was first introduced to the Star Wars universe via a mention in the 2009 novel, Imperial Commando: 501st, the fifth in the Republic Commando series authored by Karen Traviss.
